topic.title: Create Volume Type and Extra Specs

section.p:
Create a cinder storage backend from the Horizon Dashboard with the following steps:
Log in to the Horizon Dashboard as the admin user. Navigate to Admin → Volumes → Volume Types → Create Volume Type
On the resulting screen, name your new volume “Qnap_ES_NAS”, and then click the Create Volume Type button.
When the system has finished creating the volume type, select the dropdown menu for your new volume type, and then select View Extra Specs.
In the resulting Extra Specs dialog, create a new key-value pair for the volume type, using the following values:
Key: volume_backend_name
Value: Qnap_ES_NAS
Click the Create button.
When you create new volumes, they now have Qnap_ES_NAS available as a volume type.
